content.rendered:
Medical coding is a rising star in the healthcare field today. This program will prepare you for or enhance your career in this high-demand occupation and get you on track to earn a medical coding professional certification from AAPC that best aligns with your interests and career goals.

The following medical field courses, certifications, and credentials are offered by La Verne Extended Learning:

AAPC Certified Professional Coder

Medical coding is a rising star in the healthcare field today. This program prepares you for or enhances a career in this high-demand occupation and gets you on track to earn a medical coding professional certification from AAPC.

Learn More
